
{{alias}}( obj, prop, value )
    Defines a read-only property.

    Parameters
    ----------
    obj: Object
        Object on which to define the property.

    prop: string
        Property name.

    value: any
        Value to set.

    Examples
    --------
    > var obj = {};
    > {{alias}}( obj, 'foo', 'bar' );
    > obj.foo = 'boop';
    > obj
    { foo: 'bar' }

    See Also
    --------
